content:
I'm sorry, I don't have up-to-date information on the top tilapia and catfish producers in Africa, since the ranking can change every year. However, I can tell you that many African countries are major producers of tilapia and catfish. Some of the countries that have historically been known to be significant tilapia and catfish producers in Africa include Egypt, Nigeria, Ghana, Senegal, and Mozambique. These countries have favourable condition for the farming of tilapia and catfish, and have made a significant investment in the industry, both in terms of research and development, as well as in terms of infrastructure and marketing.

Note that the production may change per year due to various factors. Also keep in mind that I am not able to browse the internet to access recent numbers and data from year 2021 onwards. I suggest consulting with aquaculture industry organizations, government sources, or research institutions for more accurate and up-to-date information about tilapia and catfish production in Africa.
